name: Nari
dialog: You need to have the right brushing habits from a young age.

name: Nari
dialog: The basic brushing habit is the 333 rule!

name: Nari
dialog: Brush your teeth 3 times a day, within 3 minutes after each meal, and brush for 3 minutes each time!

name: Nari
dialog: It's also important to clean every corner of your mouth.

name: Nari
dialog: Brush the outside of your front teeth and molars in the direction of the teeth, starting from the gums.

name: Nari
dialog: Brush the inside of your front teeth in a circular motion, using a vertical brush position.

name: Nari
dialog: Clean the chewing surfaces by brushing back and forth.

name: Nari
dialog: Don't forget to brush the inside of your molars that are difficult to reach with your brush.

name: Nari
dialog: Don't forget to gently brush your tongue as well.

name: Nari
dialog: After brushing your teeth, use dental floss to remove any food stuck in between.

name: Nari
dialog: Oops! To prevent cavities, eating habits are also important.

name: Nari
dialog: Drink plenty of water and chew food more than 30 times before swallowing.

name: Nari
dialog: It's better not to eat before going to bed and to eat less sweet food.

name: 주인공
dialog: Oh, there's so much to know and so much to do.

name: Nari
dialog: But if you do it every day, it will become a habit and it will be easier.

name: Nari
dialog: You need to develop good brushing habits right now.

name: Nari
dialog: Yap! Get ready for a mission to make healthy teeth!

name: Nari
dialog: Nari will give you a heart for a toothbrushing game, so play the toothbrushing mini-game!

name: Nari
dialog: You can get a reward after completing brushing. Smile!

name: 주인공
dialog: Got it, I'll brush my teeth right away!

name: end
dialog: z
